====== DESCRIPTION ======

The Project Studios Ceramics Residency is a work-only residency focused on exploring ceramics as a medium in contemporary art. Resident artists will have opportunities to create custom glazes, participate in Raku firings, and work with various techniques in clay. Although the focus of the residency is to produce new work in a mostly self-guided manner, there will the availability of consultation and light instruction regarding safe and effective use of the tools and materials within the ceramics studio as well as opportunities for studio visits with other artists and independent curators and area gallerists who often visit the studios. In addition, the Residency offers creative interaction and exchange with other artists working in the Ceramics Studio who will share their knowledge and experience.

The artist chosen for the residency will be awarded a solo exhibition at PROTO GOMEZ Gallery in New York City in fall or winter of 2019. The exhibition will be featured on the PROTO Gallery Artsy page and all social media for PROTO Gallery and PROTO GOMEZ.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Applicants must apply using our Submittable form at this link:

https://protogallery.submittable.com/submit/136974/ceramics-residency-at-project-studios

Please note that this residency is work-only. We do not supply housing for artists-in-residence.
